articles.title: Major Card Updates For WWE Survivor Series 2021 - WhatCulture
articles.description: With six days to go, WWE made swooping changes to its last PPV card of 2021...
articles.content:
WWE
WWE's final pay-per-view of the year, Survivor Series 2021, takes place this Sunday (21 November), and last night's episode of Raw brought a couple of big new additions to the card.
